title: Clean Clear Body
cleaned_text: Renewal for your body, mind and soul Agatha Repice's holistic health and wellness consultancy focuses on healing the body, calming the mind and invigorating the soul. Choose a Wellness plan Clean Clear Body offers nutritional health coaching as well as body and energy work, acknowledging the undeniable connection between mind, body and spirit. There is no one method, diet or treatment that works for everybody. So while interacting with my clients, I also get an understanding of their mindset. Are they holding onto resentments? Do they have healthy relationships? Do they love their jobs? It's body, mind and spirit that we need to balance in order for our bodies to be healthy. Together, we devise a plan that will work for you. Herbs & Nutrition Explore ways to get healthier with a food consultation with Agatha. Body Mind Spirit Explore different methods of energy healing. Including: Cupping, Acupressure, Access Bars, & Ear Candling As seen on "Agatha's gift and power is something that words cannot describe. She is someone I know I will always have to help and guide me. Today, I am powerful, I feel beautiful and I am living the best life that I always have deserved, thanks to Agatha" — Casey
